property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 3 and if you have summoned another fire creature this turn, you may summon it for an additional 3 less. If you do, this creature attacks this turn if able, and after it attacks, destroy this creature. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this card leaves, untap all your creatures and they get "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

card.name: Still Justice Till The End <Kira Star>

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, draw a card. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 4 or less. ■ Each of your creatures that cost 4 or less gets "blocker" and untaps at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM22-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Light Water Fire Kira Star

property.name: Rules
property.value: {KIZUNA} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may use one of your creature's Kizuna abilities.) You may cast a light spell that costs 3 or less from your hand for no cost. ESCAPE (When this creature would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Max Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR MAX EVOLUTION} When you would lose the game, destroy this creature or discard a Brand-MAX from your hand. (This creature doesn't need an evolution source. If you have 2 or more Star Max Evolution Creatures, one of them stays and return the rest of your hand.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, untap one of your other creatures. That creature breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose this creature, put one of your opponent's shields into its owner's graveyard.

Then discard a card from your hand.

property.value: Magic Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose a number. Return all your opponent's creatures that cost the same as that number to their owner's hand. TWINPACT ■ Choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that have the same cost or cast spells that have the same cost.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck.
